titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: For the first time I dined at the Athenaeum . Sir Henry Craik came to ask me, evidently to fill a gap. However, I enjoyed a pleasant evening, sitting between Crockett & Lancaster, within talking range of Sir R. Finlay & General Miles. Afterwards I had some talk with Maurice Hewlett. Other guests were Gen. Lyttelton, Birrell, Ker, Reg. Smith, & Craik jun.
